name: Full Metal Sergeant
description:
You have 12 weeks to turn the recruits into soldiers!




Develop your training schedule. If their Stamina runs out or if their Stress becomes too much, they may fail their training... or worse. More effective advanced training can be unlocked by expending Prestige Points.



Improve your soldiers and earn more Prestige Points when they graduate. Qualify them as riflemen divers, snipers, or paratroopers.



Do you have the right recruit to win a 100m sprint? Or to challenge a naval academy in a swimming competition? What about the marksmanship challenge?



Check your men's skill in mission. Make choices based on the encounters you find. Have you based your training program on agility and close-combat? Then better a sneak approach...
